item.title: Beginning of my blog!
item.description: Welcome to my blog! Hello all! I’m Keyaedisa or Key for short! I am 22 years old and nonbinary. My pronouns are they/them. I am a developer who is also getting into the cyber security space. I plan on opening up my own security firm someday and getting into the iOS security space. I am passionate about nearly all things technology and love learning more. I have been learning a lot about programming and linux this past year.

item.title: Abs 3.0
item.description: Project Scope abs 3.0 will be the first version of abs to offer a GUI! Additionally, the goals with abs 3.0 are as follows GUI Allow the user even deeper customization of their ISO Error catching Useable on any operating system Helping the user with the install process from the live ISO and more! abs 3.0 will be a revolutionary jump in the custom archiso space and will make creating your own custom arch iso trivial!

item.title: abs 2.0!
item.description: Intro The most recent compiled version of abs is hosted on my package repo called Valen and can be found at Valen Repo! The project repo can be found at abs github! abs is a terminal utility I wrote in bash meant to not only automate the build process of any archiso profile it is provided, but to also make it an interative process. It allows you to customize the contents of your profiledef.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hi! My name’s key and this is my first test post! I am not sure what to put here but this is just a test!
